entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
